title: Delay of morning ritual
vignette: Oversleeping community elders begin the daily ritual late.

options.text: Proceed quickly even if after sunrise.
Cancel and wait until the next day.

title: Insufficient wood on the offering place
vignette: A shortage of firewood threatens the constant flame.

options.text: Use leftover holiday decorations as fuel.
Do not improvise; wait for proper wood.

title: Non-community elder helping with ritual preparation
vignette: A lay community member volunteers to assist with the daily offering.

options.text: Allow limited help under supervision.
Only community elders may perform any part.

title: Using imperfect animal by mistake
vignette: During the rush an imperfect lamb is selected for the daily offering.

options.text: Replace it immediately with an perfect one.
Proceed to avoid delays.

title: Extra singing during service
vignette: Community singers wishes to add additional hymns beyond the usual.

options.text: Allow creative expression to inspire worshippers.
Stick to the prescribed ritual text only.

title: Cleaning ashes on holiday
vignette: The offering place is overflowing with ashes during a holiday.

options.text: Remove them despite holiday work limits.
Wait until after the holiday ends.

title: Forgotten utensil overnight
vignette: A community elder leaves a knife for special use outside the central assembly place courtyard overnight.

options.text: Rinse it and use it; no harm done.
The utensil must be restored to special status before use.

title: Argument among community elders over tasks
vignette: Two community elders quarrel about who performs which part of the service.

options.text: Decide by lottery to keep peace.
Let seniority determine the roles.

title: Insufficient aromatic resin prepared
vignette: Only half the usual portion of aromatic resin is mixed for the day.

options.text: Use what is available rather than none.
Delay until the full measure can be prepared.

title: Changing the order of service
vignette: A new supervisor proposes rearranging the steps for efficiency.

options.text: Follow the traditional sequence strictly.
Adopt the more efficient order.

title: Opening gates early
vignette: Travelers arrive before dawn demanding entry to watch the service.

options.text: Open early to accommodate them.
Keep standard hours for order.

title: Minor imperfection on community elder's garment
vignette: A tear is noticed in a community elder's robe right before the offering.

options.text: Ignore and proceed to avoid delay.
Replace or mend it first.

title: Aromatic Resin spilled on the floor
vignette: During preparation a scoop of aromatic resin powder falls to the ground.

options.text: Gather and use it if clean.
Discard it out of respect.

title: Community Elder fainting mid-service
vignette: A young community elder collapses from heat while carrying out the offering.

options.text: Pause to provide care and replace him.
Continue without interruption.

title: Untrained community elder assigned duties
vignette: A new recruit is asked to perform part of the service without prior training.

options.text: Allow under supervision to learn.
Only trained community elders may serve.
